title: Did Lady Gaga's semi-annual games show Satan?
subtitle: Some observers claimed to have seen elements of "devil rituals" in Lady Gaga's half-time performance at the Super Bowl 2017. Do they even know what Satanic ritual looks like?
author: David Emery
vclaim: Lady Gaga's half-time performance at Super Bowl in 2017 took the form of a demonic ritual.
